flash ladder game

2003-10-15

Check it out...
http://forresto.com/flash/ladder_game
the interface is not spelled out or anything, but it is not like it is hard to figure out. The reason behind this is that I was wondering why there is always one and only end for every end no matter where you draw the rungs. I learned a little about Flash in the process of making this today, but I probably implemented it very inefficiently. Raise your hand if you have a little too much time to burn during your work day...
